entry.title: Current Conditions: 18.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with rain showers and wet flurries beginning early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries changing to snow in the evening and ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
